mapper.select: select a.*,b.compmsg,b.apprmsg,b.reqmsg,c.fname,d.name AS pm_name from wbs a,works b,workfile c,MEMBER d where a.workcode = #{workcode} AND a.pm = d.id and a.workcode = b.workcode(+) AND a.workcode = c.workcode(+)
mapper.update: MERGE INTO works a USING dual ON (a.workcode = #{workcode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.reqmsg = #{reqmsg}, a.apprdate = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (workcode,reqmsg,apprdate) values (#{workcode},#{reqmsg},sysdate)

merge into workfile a using dual on (a.workcode = #{workcode}) when matched then update set a.fname = #{fname}, a.regdate = sysdate, a.uptdate = sysdate when not matched then insert values(#{workcode}, #{fname},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM wbs a, works b WHERE a.workcode = b.WORKCODE AND a.pm = #{name} AND a.status = '승인요청'

SELECT * from (SELECT rownum AS NO,a.*,b.APPRDATE,c.name as m_name FROM wbs a, works b,member c WHERE a.workcode = b.WORKCODE AND a.MANAGER = c.id AND a.pm = #{name} AND a.STATUS = '승인요청' ORDER BY b.APPRDATE desc) WHERE NO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * from (SELECT rownum AS NO,d.* from (SELECT a.title,b.fname,c.name AS m_name,regdate FROM wbs a,workfile b,MEMBER c WHERE a.WORKCODE = b.WORKCODE AND a.MANAGER = c.id AND a.PARENT = #{pcode}) d) WHERE NO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY NO desc
SELECT count(*) FROM WORKFILE a,wbs b,project c WHERE a.WORKCODE = b.WORKCODE AND b.PARENT = c.PCODE AND c.pcode = #{pcode}
